Being dangerous with @badnewsbecca, you know what that means. Uh oh. I'm a bad kid.

http://twitpic.com/2kq73s - CAUTION: Stuffed princess' or otherwise thrown on stage will meet similar fate. Skinny bitch.
#gaga6million Where's all my #twittermonsters? Nothing like the road to Milwaukee and a Gas Station Disco.
Listenin to HairNation radio..Woooahh you're invited but your friends can't come. Whata lyric. Thank god for guys with long hair and blush.
I got nothing left to do, but don't give a damn, cuz were back in Minnesota baby, with a sold out show again
Little monsters heart I keep, and as I lay me down to sleep, I dream of rainbow roads to love, for now New York city's my drug
I love you too doll baby @perezhilton
Nothin like watchin Maiden videos with a Jameson diet in my paw. Is it considered studio rehab if it involves inspirational hairmoves+booze?
http://twitpic.com/2ixeqy - Holy mother of laughter
I just saw that #becauseofgaga was #1 TT on Twitter. So darling thank u! #Becauseoflittlemonsters I am brave.
http://twitpic.com/2i4lds - Canada isn't that dry, but it for sure kicks ass. Has anyone seen my st.tropez, selftan EMERGENCY!
I see Love in Black and White. Passion in shades of "Gris". But when it comes to You and I, Color is all I see.

Haven't left the studio. Each song I write, I feel closer to you. Miss you little monsters, little inspirations. X http://twitpic.com/2gclgt
little monsters rule http://twitpic.com/2ehs9q
VEGAS tonight, gambling and inappropriate attire to ensue. why am i so jealous of strip club stage production.

Just emerged from studio bender to hear we won two teen choice awards. Thank you for believing in me little monsters! I'm your hooker. X
#Gagapalooza! A night to commemorate the most bad ass whirlwind of all time, waiting for my friends to pick me up our el camino, GINGER.
REJOICE and CELEBRATE gay communities and straight all over the world. Our voices are being heard! Loud! SCREAM LOUD AMERICANOS!
At the moments notice of PROP 8 DEATH I instantly began to write music. BUBBLE DREAMS FOREVER! FULL EQUALITY! THIS IS JUST THE BEGININNG!
At the moments notice of PROP 8 DEATH
13 VMA noms lilmonsters. Breakin records+breakin rüles. I love you, you Bad Kids are a part of me. PAWS UP! #VideoMonsterAwards
Tonight we will continue to actively protest social and political injustices in Arizona. We will sing, we will stand up, + we will be heard
The Monsterball is by nature a protest: A youth church experience to speak out and celebrate against all forms of discrimination + prejudice
and this one: for the petit french improv! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p-pRJE3kTGw
Walkin down memory lane with dancers :( , after many shots + streams we decide this is our fav. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7G0yI46vfeY
http://twitpic.com/29vw9f thanks @fernandogaribay, next time Im gonna poison and kill you like I did the rest of them
Days off in the AZ Desert: Cactus fashion + Tequila. Can't make me take off my leather, I would rather faint http://twitpic.com/29thds
I push harder, dance longer, bleed stronger. I don't want the greatest KISS tribute band of all time, I want the real band. I want KISS.
HOUSTON. Get you're fringe bikinis and boot options. Monsterball is BYOC tonight: Bring ýour own cowboy. XMotherMonster.
In my former dressing room of my old Dallas gay stomping grounds. They supported me first. SO RAD COWBOYS. http://tweetphoto.com/34655654
Gaga does Dallas. Calling all Dallas gays! Are their any inappropriate Western stores where I may find some unacceptable day wear? xMother
Going w @ladystarlightny (and a hangover) to kick our own asses in rocknroll power yoga, can I wear my cowboy boots? LET'S GET HOT!
Watching television show "Intervention", on A&E. Very informational, heartbreaking, and inspiring--has a good message. Xxmissu, gagaloo.
#Gaga5million. Here's to monsters, music, and 5 million of my closest friends! Cheers! I officially declare this institution "Tweeterland"!
Tonight love and hate met in St. Louis. And love outnumbered the hate, in poetic thousands. Hate left. But love stayed. + Together, we sang.
Be inspired to ignore their ignorant message, and feel gratitude in your heart that you are not burdened or addicted to hate, as they are. X
I wanted to make my fans aware of my views on how to approach, or rather not approach, these kinds of hate activists.
for their personal views on any politics or religion, this group in particular to me, is violent and dangerous
you are more fortunate and blessed than they are, and in your heart just pray for them. Although I respect and do not judge anyone
Do not respond to any of their provocation. Don't waste your words, or feelings, no matter what you hear or see
My request to all little monsters and public authority is to pay these hate criminals no mind. Do not interact with them, or try to fight
Their message is of hatred and divisiveness, but inside at the Monsterball we preach love and unity.
this group of protesters are hate criminals and preach using lude and violent language and imagery that I wish I protect you all from.
the Monsterball in St.Louis tonight. Although we have had protesters before, as well as fundamentalists at the show
At the risk of drawing attention to a hateful organization, I would like to make my little monster fan aware of a protest being held outside
Love is the new denim, pulling all nighters like a Hooker on a Church Corner http://twitpic.com/25utl5
a REAL gagamakeover i love little monsters they are preciousweapons!!!: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_l14MOm3WyY&feature=player_embedded
@alwaysladygaga http://tl.gd/2603vs I'm always listening, and when you're lonely. I am lonely too. Smile today monster, you are a superstar.
Emerging from studio coma. voted no visit to rocknroll hall of fame,rather write a hit that puts me in it. Now let's rock 20,000 cleveland.

Thousands of precious lil monsters are sleeping in street outside TodayShow. May NY watchover u, + may u sleep smiling under the stars. Amen
My little monster sweeties are already camped outside today show! I love u! Will be sending u pizza and water all day! And a suprise 2moro!X
#madisonsquaregaga http://twitpic.com/231p7u
Endless thank yous to my little monsters, my family, and my friends who've stood by me. And thank you New York City, for sticking by me too.
I would stare into the brightlights and imagine I could do anything. Be anything. And I would tell myself it would be me up there one day.
Today is what dreams are made of. 3 Sold out nights at MSG in my home town. I used to go watch Madonna, Cher, + the Stones and would cry
Happy 4th of July little monsters! I can smell you from backstage. Lipstick, whiskey, and the rat pack. F*ck I love AC. X Mother Monster
Ok, this is the most amazing tattoo of all time. http://twitpic.com/228c5m.
Ahhhhhhhhh smell the fireworks!! AC here we come!! RT: @wegagaloo MONSTER IS ON THE RADIO!!!!!!!!!!!! @ladygaga
Thank u so much little monsters for following me on Facebook! 10 million friends of mine who are now connected to each other. #Monsterlove.

At Bukowski's in Cambridge ordering hooker bbq and beer with my best friends SPW. Let's Rocknroll Boston. http://twitpic.com/2152fn
WERE BRINGIN BACK ROCKNROLL. Havin beers w SEMI PRECIOUS WEAPONS, RT YES! Our album @preciousweapons #YouLoveYou is top 50 on iTunes!.
My longtime friends and favorite band SEMI PRECIOUS WEAPONS Album "YOU LOVE YOU" out TODAY!Watch: http://bit.ly/dhCHTw
After marathons of Cops, parties w rocknrollers, cookin for dad+ drinkin beers, I announce: THE MONSTER BALL NORTH AMERICAN TOUR SUMMER 2010
Thank you so much for my first BET award ever, with Honey B! Videophone won VIDEO OF THE YEAR! Paws up for B! X Mother Monster.
For all the words you've shot, and all the tears we've cried, here's to New York City, and our very Gay Pride!
New Song. Written in NY on the piano I grew up on. "You and I" http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xDFC0nttdOU&feature=player_embedded
What a brilliant evening with wonderful friends. Thank you to everyone who donated to the Elton John AIDS Foundation. What a magical stage X
Eltonball! Dead bodies in trees, wheelchairs and tiaras. You sure know the way to a girls heart. Warming up. Mother Monster X
Staying in the most beautiful, magical house I've ever seen. I wish all my little monsters were here with me, The Eve of the Eltonball.
Nothin like sittin in with my favorite jazz quartet for some monday standards. I love new york,I love my friends, + that orange colored sky.
i just kicked my ass in the gym, time to wash it down with an ice cold NY beer
@gagamonster17 U are so very special, thank you for making me smile monster.http://www.twitlonger.com/show/27afc81c6329b6c1b6091442ec24686a
When it comes to our love, little monsters, there is no limit. Yours is the greatest song I've ever heard.www.twitlonger.com/show/1r99p8. MM
Love my whiskey hangover+angry texts from my best friend who barely remembers her bday. DONT PUT ME IN CHARGE IF U DONT WANT IT DONE RIGHT
Whose that knockin on my door, it musta been a quarter to four, is it u again? Comin round for more.
I guess I'm just a Bronx cheer kind of girl.
A middle finger is more New York than a corporate ambush. I bleed for my hometown, and I'd die for my fans.
Men are men, are men. A soldier is a soldier. ALEJANDRO. www.ladygaga.com
ALEJANDRO FASHION CREDITS: www.nicolaformichetti.blogspot.com Prejudice is a disease. So is fashion. But I will not wear prejudice.

But I just can't be with you like this anymore
I know that we are young, and I know that you may love me
In 3.5 hours. ALEJANDRO. 9amPST/12pmEST/5pmGMT on www.ladygaga.com and www.perezhilton.com. GAGAKLEIN.
